{"type":"tool_use","timestamp":1771657586656,"sessionID":"ses_380fb1ed9ffeRkRwnjmPTvfPbl","part":{"id":"prt_c7f0567d300174UgY1A31qgJWP","sessionID":"ses_380fb1ed9ffeRkRwnjmPTvfPbl","messageID":"msg_c7f04e178001q731ai70YSg3tu","type":"tool","callID":"call_8d9ac36faa4e4e1eadaf0942","tool":"write","state":{"status":"error","input":{"filePath":"/tmp/Dockerfile","content":"# syntax=docker/dockerfile:1.4

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Stage 1: Builder - dependencies and model download
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# System dependencies for opencv and ML libraries
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
        libgomp1 \
        libgl1 \
        libglib2.0-0 && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy dependency files first (cache layer)
COPY requirements.txt .

# Install Python dependencies (CPU-only torch)
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --target=/app/deps \
    --extra-index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu \
    -r requirements.txt

# Copy model download script and download model (separate cache layer)
COPY download_model.py .
RUN python download_model.py && \
    mv model.pt /app/model.pt

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Stage 2: Runtime - minimal production image
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM python:3.11-slim AS runtime

LABEL maintainer="ml-team@example.com"
LABEL description="ML inference service with FastAPI"
LABEL version="1.0"

WORKDIR /app

# Runtime system dependencies only
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
        libgomp1 \
        libgl1 \
        libglib2.0-0 && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && \
    useradd --create-home --shell /bin/bash appuser

# Copy dependencies from builder
COPY --from=builder /app/deps /usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages

# Copy model from builder (cached separately)
COPY --from=builder /app/model.pt /app/model.pt

# Copy application source (changes most frequently)
COPY ./app ./app

# Set ownership to non-root user
RUN chown -R appuser:appuser /app

USER appuser

EXPOSE 8000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
    CMD python -c "import urllib.request; urllib.request.urlopen('http://localhost:8000/health')" || exit 1

CMD ["python", "-m", "uvicorn", "app.main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
"},"error":"Error: The user rejected permission to use this specific tool call.","time":{"start":1771657586650,"end":1771657586654}}}}
